languages.text: Встреченный Лорд-капитаном друкари Маражай в своеобразной манере поведал о неком человеческом судне, которое постигло нечто ужасное в регионе Цинерус Малефикум. Впрочем, едва ли можно доверять словам ксеноса.

traits.locale_text: Встреченный Лорд-капитаном друкари Маражай в своеобразной манере поведал о неком человеческом судне, которое постигло нечто ужасное в регионе Цинерус Малефикум. Впрочем, едва ли можно доверять словам ксеноса.

languages.text: Marazhai the Drukhari, in his own unique fashion, informed the Lord Captain about a human vessel that had suffered some kind of calamity in the Cinerus Maleficum. Then again, it is unlikely the words of a xenos can be trusted.
languages.original_text: Встреченный Лорд-капитаном друкари Маражай в своеобразной манере поведал о неком человеческом судне, которое постигло нечто ужасное в регионе Цинерус Малефикум. Впрочем, едва ли можно доверять словам ксеноса.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai the Drukhari, in his own unique fashion, informed the Lord Captain about a human vessel that had suffered some kind of calamity in the Cinerus Maleficum. Then again, it is unlikely the words of a xenos can be trusted.

Marazhai the Drukhari, in his own unique fashion, informed the Lord Captain about a human vessel that had suffered some kind of calamity in the Cinerus Maleficum. Then again, it is unlikely the words of a xenos can be trusted.

Marazhai the Drukhari, in his own unique fashion, informed the Lord Captain about a human vessel that had suffered some kind of calamity in the Cinerus Maleficum. Then again, it is unlikely the words of a xenos can be trusted.

Marazhai the Drukhari, in his own unique fashion, informed the Lord Captain about a human vessel that had suffered some kind of calamity in the Cinerus Maleficum. Then again, it is unlikely the words of a xenos can be trusted.

languages.text: 黑暗灵族玛拉斋以他自己独有的方式，向领主舰长发出了通告，说人类的舰船在苍灰恶咒遭遇了某种灾难。但话说回来，异形的话恐怕并不值得相信。
languages.original_text: Marazhai the Drukhari, in his own unique fashion, informed the Lord Captain about a human vessel that had suffered some kind of calamity in the Cinerus Maleficum. Then again, it is unlikely the words of a xenos can be trusted.

traits.locale_text: 黑暗灵族玛拉斋以他自己独有的方式，向领主舰长发出了通告，说人类的舰船在苍灰恶咒遭遇了某种灾难。但话说回来，异形的话恐怕并不值得相信。

languages.text: デュカーリのマラズハイは、彼独自の方法で、サイネラス・マレフィカムで何らかの災難に見舞われた人間の船についてロード・キャプテンに知らせてきた。しかし異種族の言葉は信頼できるようには思えない。
languages.original_text: Marazhai the Drukhari, in his own unique fashion, informed the Lord Captain about a human vessel that had suffered some kind of calamity in the Cinerus Maleficum. Then again, it is unlikely the words of a xenos can be trusted.

traits.locale_text: デュカーリのマラズハイは、彼独自の方法で、サイネラス・マレフィカムで何らかの災難に見舞われた人間の船についてロード・キャプテンに知らせてきた。しかし異種族の言葉は信頼できるようには思えない。

languages.text: Marazhai el Drukhari ha informado a su manera a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán de la existencia de una nave que había sufrido algún percance catastrófico en el Cinerus Maleficum. Sin embargo, las palabras de un xenos no son nada fiables.
languages.original_text: Marazhai the Drukhari, in his own unique fashion, informed the Lord Captain about a human vessel that had suffered some kind of calamity in the Cinerus Maleficum. Then again, it is unlikely the words of a xenos can be trusted.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai el Drukhari ha informado a su manera a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán de la existencia de una nave que había sufrido algún percance catastrófico en el Cinerus Maleficum. Sin embargo, las palabras de un xenos no son nada fiables.

languages.text: Marazhai der Drukhari hat den Lord Captain auf seine unnachahmliche Art über ein Menschenschiff informiert, das im Cinerus Maleficum in wie Schwierigkeiten geraten ist. Andererseits sollte man den Worten eines Xenos nicht allzu viel Glauben schenken.
languages.original_text: Marazhai the Drukhari, in his own unique fashion, informed the Lord Captain about a human vessel that had suffered some kind of calamity in the Cinerus Maleficum. Then again, it is unlikely the words of a xenos can be trusted.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai der Drukhari hat den Lord Captain auf seine unnachahmliche Art über ein Menschenschiff informiert, das im Cinerus Maleficum in wie Schwierigkeiten geraten ist. Andererseits sollte man den Worten eines Xenos nicht allzu viel Glauben schenken.

languages.text: Marazhai le Drukhari informe, à sa manière, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} qu'un vaisseau humain a connu une fin tragique dans le Cinerus Maleficum. Cela dit, les allégations d'un xénos sont rarement dignes de confiance.
languages.original_text: Marazhai the Drukhari, in his own unique fashion, informed the Lord Captain about a human vessel that had suffered some kind of calamity in the Cinerus Maleficum. Then again, it is unlikely the words of a xenos can be trusted.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai le Drukhari informe, à sa manière, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} qu'un vaisseau humain a connu une fin tragique dans le Cinerus Maleficum. Cela dit, les allégations d'un xénos sont rarement dignes de confiance.

languages.text: Drukhari Marazhai, kendine has üslubuyla Lord Kaptan'ı Cinerus Maleficum'daki bir felaketten nasibini alan bir insan gemisi hakkında bilgilendirdi. Gelgelelim zenoların lafına güven olmaz.
languages.original_text: Marazhai the Drukhari, in his own unique fashion, informed the Lord Captain about a human vessel that had suffered some kind of calamity in the Cinerus Maleficum. Then again, it is unlikely the words of a xenos can be trusted.

traits.locale_text: Drukhari Marazhai, kendine has yöntemleriyle Lord Kaptan'ı, Cinerus Maleficum'da yaşanan bir çeşit felakete yakalanan bir insan gemisi hakkında bilgilendirdi. Bir zenonun sözlerine muhtemelen güvenilmez ama tabii.
